author: wn.com
title: PM receives congratulatory letter from Prime Minister of Bahrain for obtaining ICTs in Sustainable Development ...
text: ( Source : Royal Thai Government ) PM receives congratulatory letter from Prime Minister of Bahrain for obtaining ICTs in Sustainable Development Award October 12 , 2015 , at 0830hrs, at the Ivory Room , Government House , Mr. Abdulla Hassan Saif ,
